abstracts.cdata!:
This project paper seeks the approval of
            the Executive Director to introduce changes in the Maldives
            Integrated Human Development Project (Credit No. 3948,
            Project ID P078523). The proposed restructuring involves
            changing the project objectives so that they are measurable
            in line with the requirements of IDA 14. The proposed
            changes will not affect the project components nor the
            activities financed by the project. The changes also better
            reflect the evolving situation in the Maldives which was hit
            by the Tsunami on December 26,2004. The new objectives of
            the project are to assist the borrower in improving the
            delivery of social services on Focus Islands. Two of the
            eight performance indicators will be dropped because it is
            difficult to establish a baseline for these and thus they
            are not in line with the IDA 14 guidelines. The proposed
            changes will have little effect on the project as appraised.
            The one activity that has been dropped will be a
            contribution to an UNDP supported micro-finance program,
